summary: At 2:37, someone commits suicide in the school lavatory. The day is told up to that point from the viewpoint of six different students.
cast: Teresa Palmer|Frank Sweet|Sam Harris|Charles Baird|Joel Mackenzie|Marni Russo|Clementine Mellor|Sarah Hudson|Gary Sweet|Amy Schapel|Xavier Samuel|Chris Olver|Camille Qurban|Olivia Furlong|Daniel Whyte|Brenton Tregloan|Dominic Pedlar|Irena Dangov|Bryce Nankivell|Mark 'Crafty' Dean|Elsie Kinnaird|Michael Griffin|Adam Balales|John Ovenden|Peta Shannon|Alan Matthews|Andrea Mirabelli|Vamsee Thalluri|Josh Jervis-Bardy|Simon Prowse|Brad Wong|Gavin Weise|Marcus Stepin|Sam Suhard|Adrian Crawford
